name: acmwebutil
description: This small API powers member and due management for UA student organizations

FROM_EMAIL.description: The from email address for emails to members (must have a registered account with listserv.ua.edu)

FROM_ALIAS.description: The email alias (name) that displays in the headers of emails to members

LISTSERV_PASSWORD.description: The password associated with the from email for Listserv

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: The API key provided by Sendgrid for sending mass emails

SECRET_KEY.description: The authorization key used for protected API calls (preferable use a randomly generated, long key)
